title: [PS2] Sega Ages 2500 Vol 26 - Dynamite Deka
description:
"Sega kicked ass with this restoration of the ST-V powered beat 'em up classic Dynamite Deka (AKA Die Hard Arcade). The reason being is that Sega went to great measures in enhancing the game's look and unlockable features to take use of the Playstation 2's extra power. All without compromising on the game itself. Dynamite Deka on PS2 definitely looks comparable to some of the full price games out at the same time. This is how you develop a budget game properly. "

This has been converted to DVD
Just burn it (use ImgBurn) and have fun on your PS2 Hardware.

There was a sequel released for Dreamcast and Arcade

covers included

Cover online: http://img.gamefaqs.net/box/8/4/7/69847_front.jpg
